text:
────Mhm, you're really focused on the live.
…………Huh?

……?
We're getting into a good flow right now.

Even so, take a break.
You probably haven't had any water at all.
Ah, now that you mention it, that's true.
Ideally, you should be drinking little bits regularly...

And also, since you're exercising,
you should have some salt candies or something...
Phew, can't take my eyes off it...
